title: Mini-Ep 159: Wet Sinks and Wedding Rings
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 159: Wet Sinks and Wedding Rings
itunes:subtitle: Kate is waiting for a mysterious package, Doree can’t stop watching The Undoing, and listeners ask questions about how not to splash water everywhere when washing your face, the best hair dryer, and changing your last name for marriage.To leave a vo...
description:
Kate is waiting for a mysterious package, Doree can’t stop watching The Undoing, and listeners ask questions about how not to splash water everywhere when washing your face, the best hair dryer, and changing your last name for marriage.


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

ULTA BEAUTY - See the joy this holiday season! Shop in store, curbside pickup or online at ulta.com.

CONAIR - Try the Turbo Extreme Steam Handheld Steamer!To buy go to conair.com and search Turbo Extreme Steam.

FIGS - For 15% off your first purchase from FIGS, go to wearfigs.com and enter promo code FOREVER at checkout.

BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.

RITUAL - For 10% off during your first three months visit ritual.com/FOREVER35. 

HAWTHORNE - Find the perfect gift this holiday season by visiting Hawthorne.CO/GIFT!


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
